alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Chickasaw; Fayette; Howard; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 5:39AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Howard, northern Fayette, Allamakee, Winneshiek, eastern Chickasaw and southern Houston Counties through 630 AM CDT... At 539 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Protivin to near Fredericksburg. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Cresco, Ridgeway and Protivin around 545 AM CDT. Decorah around 555 AM CDT. Calmar, Spillville and Fort Atkinson around 600 AM CDT. Ossian around 605 AM CDT. Spring Grove around 610 AM CDT. Waukon and New Albin around 625 AM CDT. Lansing around 630 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Volney, Vernon Springs County Park, County Roads A 52 And W 60, Festina, Vernon Springs, Nordness, County Roads V 58 And A 46, Quandahl, County 5 And Peyton Road and Red Barn Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
